user.title: Connect to Gonzales
user.description:
**Using the Gonzales Add-on?** Just click OK - the defaults should work automatically.

**Standalone installation?** Enter the IP address and port of your Gonzales server.

data_description.host: For the add-on, try 'local-gonzales' or 'local_gonzales'. For standalone, use the server IP.
data_description.port: Default is 8099. Only change if you configured a different port.
data_description.api_key: Leave empty for the add-on. Only needed for standalone with authentication.
data_description.scan_interval: How often to fetch data from Gonzales (does not affect speed test interval)

hassio_confirm.title: Gonzales Add-on Discovered
hassio_confirm.description:
The Gonzales Speed Monitor add-on has been detected at **{host}:{port}**.

Click Submit to complete the setup.

error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to Gonzales API. Is the add-on running? Check host and port.

abort.already_configured: This Gonzales instance is already configured.
